intro_only_event_timeattack_intro_1/4901:
Even though it’s beneath me...I suppose I’ll
tell you!

I have created a new kind of Pokémon battle here
on Pasio.

It’s more than just a Pokémon battle! You compete
with other Trainers to take down your opponents
as fast as you can!

Speed will be crucial for these battles. You can’t
win solely by defeating your opponents!

I’ve even prepared some prizes, not that you and
your pathetic lot stand a chance at winning them!
Feel free to waste your time trying, though!
